heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers likely in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley, and possibly a late-day squall; chance south to Lake George and east to the Green Mountains, with a trace to an inch, mainly over high terrain; likely dry elsewhere. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30 north, low to mid 30s in the south. South to southeast 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow showers or a squall, mainly before midnight; another trace to an inch, locally higher in the southern Greens. Lows from the mid teens to lower 20s, cold spots in the lower teens. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy near the Vermont/Québec border. Chance of flurries in the northern mountains. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s far north. West winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
